title: Enhancing E-Learning Practical Skills: Short-Intensive Foreign Language Communication Training for Science Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific terminology and elementary-level foreign language proficiency
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Ability to engage in sustained conversations with native speakers for over 15 minutes using specialized scientific terminology
Application of more than 20 core sentence structures by field when drafting practical emails/reports

Learners can explain three core science concepts (e.g., photosynthesis, gravity) in English within a 5-minute live video conference, achieving at least 4 points per category (pronunciation, content accuracy, delivery) on a presentation rubric (total ≥12 points) to demonstrate presentation proficiency.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
